rows.label: tev025001_MSG0001
rows.name:
When I was exploring near South Coast the other day,
I found a kepha holly shrub. They're really rare![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025001_MSG0002
rows.name:
Apparently some indigens just hate the smell of its
pollen, so I was thinking it would be great if I could
gather a bunch for its defensive properties.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025001_MSG0003
rows.name:
And then, BAM! I stumbled into a whole copse of 'em!
Pretty lucky, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025001_MSG0004
rows.name:
If you're ever searching for kepha holly yourself,
South Coast is the place to look.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025001_MSG0009
rows.name:
When I got back to New LA, I summoned up my
courage and talked to Thomas at the gate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025001_MSG0010
rows.name:
He was able to teach me a lot of things I didn't know
about piloting Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025001_MSG0011
rows.name:
He even offered to take me on a training session.
What a great guy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025001_MSG0012
rows.name:
I really need to get out and talk to more people.
We can pursue our duties a lot more effectively
if we all work together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025001_MSG0013
rows.name:
Thanks for your advice, [ST:playername ].
You were absolutely right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025001_MSG1001
rows.name:
I've been continuing my survey of Oblivia with that
Skell you helped me fix.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025001_MSG1002
rows.name:
I'm doing it solo, so I'm just fleeing from one tough
indigen after another.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025001_MSG1003
rows.name:
But I'm finding all sorts of rare collectibles—like
kridokan air and nopoliths—in the areas where I'm
taking refuge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025001_MSG1004
rows.name:
For such a lousy BLADE, I feel like I'm really
accomplishing a lot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025001_MSG1005
rows.name:
Let's both keep doing our best, okay? And thanks for
taking the time to talk to a D-list BLADE like me![ST:wait ]
